verses.verse: וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> heard צָרֵ֥י <WH6862> Now when the adversaries יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> and Benjamin כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that בְנֵ֤י <WH1121> that the children הַגּוֹלָה֙ <WH1473> of the captivity בּוֹנִ֣ים <WH1129> builded הֵיכָ֔ל <WH1964> the temple לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <WH5066> Then they came אֶל־ <WH413> about זְרֻבָּבֶ֜ל <WH2216> to Zerubbabel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> and to the chief הָֽאָב֗וֹת <WH1> of the fathers וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> and said לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> us נִבְנֶ֣ה <WH1129> unto them Let us build עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> with כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָכֶ֔ם נִדְר֖וֹשׁ <WH1875> with you for we seek לֵֽאלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we זֹבְחִ֗ים <WH2076> as ye [do] and we do sacrifice מִימֵי֙ <WH3117> unto him since the days אֵסַ֤ר חַדֹּן֙ <WH634> of Esarhaddon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assur הַמַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> which brought us up hither אֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> פֹּֽה׃ <WH6311> here

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said לָהֶ֨ם זְרֻבָּבֶ֜ל <WH2216> But Zerubbabel וְיֵשׁ֗וּעַ <WH3442> and Jeshua וּשְׁאָ֨ר <WH7605> and the rest רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> of the chief הָֽאָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have nothing לָ֣כֶם וָלָ֔נוּ לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> unto them Ye have nothing to do with us to build בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לֵאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> unto our God כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves יַ֜חַד <WH3162> but we ourselves together נִבְנֶ֗ה <WH1129> will build לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֔נוּ <WH6680> hath commanded הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> as king כּ֥וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king פָּרָֽס׃ <WH6539> of Persia

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> Then עַם־ <WH5971> Then the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land מְרַפִּ֖ים <WH7503> weakened יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> the hands עַם־ <WH5971> of the people יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah [וּמְבַלַהִים כ] (וּֽמְבַהֲלִ֥ים <WH1086> consume ק) אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> them in building

וְסֹכְרִ֧ים <WH7936> And hired עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> against יוֹעֲצִ֖ים <WH3289> counsellors לְהָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> against them to frustrate עֲצָתָ֑ם <WH6098> their purpose כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֗י <WH3117> all the days כּ֚וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia וְעַד־ <WH5704> until מַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> even until the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פָּרָֽס׃ <WH6539> of Persia

וּבְמַלְכוּת֙ <WH4438> And in the reign אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <WH325> of Ahasuerus בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <WH8462> in the beginning מַלְכוּת֑וֹ <WH4438> of his reign כָּתְב֣וּ <WH3789> wrote שִׂטְנָ֔ה <WH7855> they [unto him] an accusation עַל־ <WH5921> against יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> against the inhabitants יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem ס

וּבִימֵ֣י <WH3117> And in the days אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֗שְׂתָּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes כָּתַ֨ב <WH3789> wrote בִּשְׁלָ֜ם <WH1312> Bishlam מִתְרְדָ֤ת <WH4990> Mithredath טָֽבְאֵל֙ <WH2870> Tabeel וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> and the rest [כְּנָוֹתֹו כ] (כְּנָוֹתָ֔יו <WH3674> companion ק) עַל־ <WH5921> and [אַרְתַּחְשַׁשְׂתָּא כ] (אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּ <WH783> Artaxerxes ק) מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרָ֑ס <WH6539> of Persia וּכְתָב֙ <WH3791> and the writing הַֽנִּשְׁתְּוָ֔ן <WH5406> of the letter כָּת֥וּב <WH3789> [was] written אֲרָמִ֖ית <WH762> in the Syrian tongue וּמְתֻרְגָּ֥ם <WH8638> and interpreted אֲרָמִֽית׃ <WH762> in the Syrian tongue פ

רְח֣וּם <WH7348> Rehum בְּעֵל־ <WH1169> chancellor טְעֵ֗ם <WH2942> chancellor וְשִׁמְשַׁי֙ <WH8124> and Shimshai סָֽפְרָ֔א <WH5613> the scribe כְּתַ֛בוּ <WH3790> wrote אִגְּרָ֥ה <WH104> letter חֲדָ֖ה <WH2298> a עַל־ <WH5922> against יְרוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> Jerusalem לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥שְׂתְּא <WH783> to Artaxerxes מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king כְּנֵֽמָא׃ <WH3660> in this sort

אֱדַ֜יִן <WH116> Then רְח֣וּם <WH7348> [wrote] Rehum בְּעֵל־ <WH1169> chancellor טְעֵ֗ם <WH2942> chancellor וְשִׁמְשַׁי֙ <WH8124> and Shimshai סָֽפְרָ֔א <WH5613> the scribe וּשְׁאָ֖ר <WH7606> and the rest כְּנָוָתְה֑וֹן <WH3675> of their companions דִּ֠ינָיֵא <WH1784> the Dinaites וַאֲפַרְסַתְכָיֵ֞א <WH671> the Apharsathchites טַרְפְּלָיֵ֣א <WH2967> the Tarpelites אֲפָֽרְסָיֵ֗א <WH670> the Apharsites [אַרְכְּוָי כ] (אַרְכְּוָיֵ֤א <WH756> Archevite ק) בָבְלָיֵא֙ <WH896> the Babylonians שֽׁוּשַׁנְכָיֵ֔א <WH7801> the Susanchites [דִּהוּא כ] (דֶּהָיֵ֖א <WH1768> forasmuch ק) עֵלְמָיֵֽא׃ <WH5962> [and] the Elamites

וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7606> And the rest אֻמַּיָּ֗א <WH524> of the nations דִּ֤י <WH1768> whom הַגְלִי֙ <WH1541> brought over אָסְנַפַּר֙ <WH620> Asnappar רַבָּ֣א <WH7229> the great וְיַקִּירָ֔א <WH3358> and noble וְהוֹתֵ֣ב <WH3488> and settled הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> them בְּקִרְיָ֖ה <WH7149> in the cities דִּ֣י <WH1768> which שָׁמְרָ֑יִן <WH8115> of Samaria וּשְׁאָ֥ר <WH7606> and the rest עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> [that are] on this side נַהֲרָ֖ה <WH5103> the river וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <WH3706> and at such a time

דְּנָה֙ <WH1836> This פַּרְשֶׁ֣גֶן <WH6573> [is] the copy אִגַּרְתָּ֔א <WH104> of the letter דִּ֚י <WH1768> that שְׁלַ֣חוּ <WH7972> they sent עֲל֔וֹהִי <WH5922> unto him עַל־ <WH5922> about אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּא <WH783> [even] unto Artaxerxes מַלְכָּ֑א <WH4430> the king [עַבְדָיִךְ <WH5649> Thy servants כ] (עַבְדָ֛ךְ ק) אֱנָ֥שׁ <WH606> the men עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> on this side נַהֲרָ֖ה <WH5103> the river וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <WH3706> and at such a time פ

יְדִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3046> known לֶהֱוֵ֣א <WH1934> Be it לְמַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> unto the king דִּ֣י <WH1768> which יְהוּדָיֵ֗א <WH3062> that the Jews דִּ֤י <WH1768> who סְלִ֙קוּ֙ <WH5559> came up מִן־ <WH4481> from לְוָתָ֔ךְ <WH3890> thee עֲלֶ֥ינָא <WH5922> to us אֲת֖וֹ <WH858> are come לִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> unto Jerusalem קִרְיְתָ֨א <WH7149> city מָֽרָדְתָּ֤א <WH4779> the rebellious וּבִֽאישְׁתָּא֙ <WH873> and the bad בָּנַ֔יִן <WH1124> building [וְשׁוּרַיָּ כ] (וְשׁוּרַיָּ֣א <WH7792> wall ק) [אֶשְׁכְלִלוּ כ] (שַׁכְלִ֔לוּ <WH3635> complete ק) וְאֻשַּׁיָּ֖א <WH787> the foundations יַחִֽיטוּ׃ <WH2338> [thereof] and joined

כְּעַ֗ן <WH3705> now יְדִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3046> it be known לֶהֱוֵ֣א <WH1934> become לְמַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> unto the king דִּ֠י <WH1768> that הֵ֣ן <WH2006> that if קִרְיְתָ֥א <WH7149> city דָךְ֙ <WH1791> this תִּתְבְּנֵ֔א <WH1124> be builded וְשׁוּרַיָּ֖ה <WH7792> and the walls יִֽשְׁתַּכְלְל֑וּן <WH3635> set up מִנְדָּֽה־ <WH4061> toll בְל֤וֹ <WH1093> tribute וַהֲלָךְ֙ <WH1983> and custom לָ֣א <WH3809> [again then] will they not יִנְתְּנ֔וּן <WH5415> pay וְאַפְּתֹ֥ם <WH674> the revenue מַלְכִ֖ים <WH4430> of the kings תְּהַנְזִֽק׃ <WH5142> and [so] thou shalt endamage

כְּעַ֗ן <WH3705> Now כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵל֙ <WH6903> according to דִּֽי־ <WH1768> we have מְלַ֤ח <WH4416> maintenance הֵֽיכְלָא֙ <WH1965> from [the king's] palace מְלַ֔חְנָא <WH4415> the service וְעַרְוַ֣ת <WH6173> dishonour מַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> the king's לָ֥א <WH3809> and it was not אֲ‍ֽרִֽיךְ <WH749> meet לַ֖נָא לְמֶֽחֱזֵ֑א <WH2370> for us to see עַ֨ל־ <WH5922> about דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> time שְׁלַ֖חְנָא <WH7972> have we sent וְהוֹדַ֥עְנָא <WH3046> and certified לְמַלְכָּֽא׃ <WH4430> the king

דִּ֡י <WH1768> so יְבַקַּר֩ <WH1240> That search בִּֽסְפַר־ <WH5609> may be made in the book דָּכְרָ֨נַיָּ֜א <WH1799> of the records דִּ֣י <WH1768> so אֲבָהָתָ֗ךְ <WH2> of thy fathers וּ֠תְהַשְׁכַּח <WH7912> so shalt thou find בִּסְפַ֣ר <WH5609> in the book דָּכְרָנַיָּא֮ <WH1799> of the records וְתִנְדַּע֒ <WH3046> and know דִּי֩ <WH1768> so קִרְיְתָ֨א <WH7149> city דָ֜ךְ <WH1791> that this קִרְיָ֣א <WH7149> city מָֽרָדָ֗א <WH4779> [is] a rebellious וּֽמְהַנְזְקַ֤ת <WH5142> and hurtful מַלְכִין֙ <WH4430> unto kings וּמְדִנָ֔ן <WH4083> and provinces וְאֶשְׁתַּדּוּר֙ <WH849> sedition עָבְדִ֣ין <WH5648> and that they have moved בְּגַוַּ֔הּ <WH1459> within the same מִן־ <WH4481> of יוֹמָ֖ת <WH3118> time עָלְמָ֑א <WH5957> old עַ֨ל־ <WH5922> for דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> which קִרְיְתָ֥א <WH7149> city דָ֖ךְ <WH1791> cause was this הָֽחָרְבַֽת׃ <WH2718> destroyed

מְהוֹדְעִ֤ין <WH3046> certify אֲנַ֙חְנָה֙ <WH586> We לְמַלְכָּ֔א <WH4430> the king דִּ֠י <WH1768> that הֵ֣ן <WH2006> that if קִרְיְתָ֥א <WH7149> city דָךְ֙ <WH1791> this תִּתְבְּנֵ֔א <WH1124> be builded וְשׁוּרַיָּ֖ה <WH7792> [again] and the walls יִֽשְׁתַּכְלְל֑וּן <WH3635> thereof set up לָקֳבֵ֣ל <WH6903> means דְּנָ֔ה <WH1836> by this חֲלָק֙ <WH2508> portion בַּעֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> on this side נַהֲרָ֔א <WH5103> the river לָ֥א <WH3809> no אִיתַ֖י <WH383> thou shalt have לָֽךְ׃ פ

פִּתְגָמָ֞א <WH6600> an answer שְׁלַ֣ח <WH7972> [Then] sent מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> the king עַל־ <WH5922> unto רְח֤וּם <WH7348> Rehum בְּעֵל־ <WH1169> chancellor טְעֵם֙ <WH2942> chancellor וְשִׁמְשַׁ֣י <WH8124> and [to] Shimshai סָֽפְרָ֔א <WH5613> the scribe וּשְׁאָר֙ <WH7606> and [to] the rest כְּנָוָ֣תְה֔וֹן <WH3675> of their companions דִּ֥י <WH1768> who יָתְבִ֖ין <WH3488> that dwell בְּשָֽׁמְרָ֑יִן <WH8115> in Samaria וּשְׁאָ֧ר <WH7606> and [unto] the rest עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> beyond נַהֲרָ֛ה <WH5103> the river שְׁלָ֖ם <WH8001> Peace וּכְעֶֽת׃ <WH3706> and at such a time ס

נִשְׁתְּוָנָ֕א <WH5407> The letter דִּ֥י <WH1768> which שְׁלַחְתּ֖וּן <WH7972> which ye sent עֲלֶ֑ינָא <WH5922> unto us מְפָרַ֥שׁ <WH6568> hath been plainly קֱרִ֖י <WH7123> read קָדָמָֽי׃ <WH6925> before

וּמִנִּי֮ <WH4481> And I שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> has been issued טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> A decree וּבַקַּ֣רוּ <WH1240> and search וְהַשְׁכַּ֔חוּ <WH7912> hath been made and it is found דִּ֚י <WH1768> that קִרְיְתָ֣א <WH7149> city דָ֔ךְ <WH1791> that this מִן־ <WH4481> of יוֹמָת֙ <WH3118> time עָֽלְמָ֔א <WH5957> old עַל־ <WH5922> against מַלְכִ֖ין <WH4430> kings מִֽתְנַשְּׂאָ֑ה <WH5376> hath made insurrection וּמְרַ֥ד <WH4776> and [that] rebellion וְאֶשְׁתַּדּ֖וּר <WH849> and sedition מִתְעֲבֶד־ <WH5648> have been made בַּֽהּ׃

וּמַלְכִ֣ין <WH4430> kings תַּקִּיפִ֗ין <WH8624> mighty הֲווֹ֙ <WH1934> There have been עַל־ <WH5922> also over יְר֣וּשְׁלֶ֔ם <WH3390> Jerusalem וְשַׁ֨לִּיטִ֔ין <WH7990> which have ruled בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3606> over all עֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> [countries] beyond נַהֲרָ֑ה <WH5103> the river וּמִדָּ֥ה <WH4061> and toll בְל֛וֹ <WH1093> tribute וַהֲלָ֖ךְ <WH1983> and custom מִתְיְהֵ֥ב <WH3052> was paid לְהֽוֹן׃
